message.raw:
Fixed bug in levelplot plotting that caused bizarre behavior when plotting
a Nx1 matrix. (mat[row.ord, col.ord, drop = FALSE] is the fix)
                                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^
Changed "segtools" to "Segtools" references
